sentence: Rep. Tim Ryan, the leading Democrat in the Ohio Senate contest, sees an opportunity as the Republicans in the race jockey to be the Trumpiest of the bunch.
author: Jill Colvin
title: Pro-Trump Ohio candidates realize endorsement may never come
